code: import React,{useState}from'react';import BorrowerAuth from'./BorrowerAuth';import BorrowerDashboard from'./BorrowerDashboard';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const BorrowerPortal=()=>{const[isAuthenticated,setIsAuthenticated]=useState(false);const[borrowerData,setBorrowerData]=useState(null);const handleLogin=(borrowerId,data)=>{setBorrowerData(data);setIsAuthenticated(true);};const handleLogout=()=>{setIsAuthenticated(false);setBorrowerData(null);};if(!isAuthenticated||!borrowerData){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BorrowerAuth,{onLogin:handleLogin});}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BorrowerDashboard,{borrowerData:borrowerData,onLogout:handleLogout});};export default BorrowerPortal;
